name: known
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
B2 used to refer to something or someone that is familiar to or understood by people: These people are known criminals. There is no known reason for the accident. He is known to the police because of his previous criminal record. See also
well known known as something
B1 If someone or something is known as a particular name, that person or thing is called by that name: And this is Terry, otherwise known as "Muscleman".
See more make something known
to tell people about something so that it becomes publicly known: Local residents have made known their objections to the proposals.
See more
More examplesFewer examplesThere is no known cure for this disease .Allegations that Mr Dwight was receiving money from known criminals have caused a scandal.His family are known gangsters.Known drug dealers are operating in the area.They are known to the authorities for playing truant.
